text.__SUMMARY__: Rhododendron gracilentum is a small, evergreen rhododendron species native to Papua New Guinea. It grows to a height of 60 cm. (2 feet), with red flowers.
text.References:
Trans. Roy. Soc. Victoria n.s., 1(2): 22 1889.
